name: mosaicHUB
tag_list: mosaichub, startup, entrepreneur, small-business, professional-networking, social-media
overview:
mosaicHUB is an online community for entrepreneurs. We provide a free platform for entrepreneurs to connect with each other and with service providers and find answers and resources to help launch, run and grow great businesses.

Our features include:

Service Provider Search. Through our Service Provider Search feature you can quickly find service providers to help you start or grow your company. We offer comprehensive marketing profiles, which include recommendations and links to each service provider’s posted resources and answers.

Open Forum. Our Open Forum provides an easy to use venue that fosters rich content-driven discussions amongst entrepreneurs and service providers. We protect the integrity of the forum by only allowing members and registered service providers to participate in the discussions.

Resource Center. Our Resource Center contains forms, articles and other valuable business resources. Resources are posted solely by our members and registered service providers. These controls help ensure that only the highest quality materials are available through our site.

HubSpace. The HubSpace feature provides each member with a simple tool to help organize, collaborate and share resources, from informative articles to useful answers. Having resources in one place significantly reduces the time spent on having to repeat searches or remember where you found a resource.

You can join our community or find more information at http://www.mosaichub.com/
